solution_line_template: Mary added a total of {stickers_per_other_page} stickers/page * {num_other_pages} pages= <<{stickers_per_other_page}*{num_other_pages}={stickers_on_other_pages}>>{stickers_on_other_pages} stickers to the 6 other pages.

In total, Mary added {large_stickers_front_page} large stickers + {stickers_on_other_pages} stickers = <<{large_stickers_front_page}+{stickers_on_other_pages}={total_stickers_added}>>{total_stickers_added} stickers to her journal.

Since she started with {initial_stickers} stickers, she now has {initial_stickers} - {total_stickers_added} = <<{initial_stickers}-{total_stickers_added}={remaining_stickers}>>{remaining_stickers} stickers left.
